Bash(git commit -m "Fix deadline parsing: convert GPT date string to datetime

Problem: Tasks created via voice had NULL deadline, so /today command found no tasks.

Root cause:
- GPT returns ''deadline'': ''2025-10-20'' (date string)
- ParsedTask expected ''deadline_text'' but got ''deadline''  
- No conversion from string to datetime object

Changes:
- src/ai/parsers/task_parser.py: Updated ParsedTask model
  - deadline_text → deadline (matches GPT output)
  - project_name → project
  - assigned_to_name → assigned_to
  - Added deadline to logging

- src/ai/graphs/voice_task_creation.py: 
  - parse_task_node: Updated field names (parsed_deadline instead of parsed_deadline_text)
  - create_task_db_node: Added deadline string → datetime conversion
    - Parses ISO date string (e.g. ''2025-10-20'')
    - Sets time to end of day (23:59:59)
    - Generates deadline_text for display
  - format_response_node: Updated to use parsed_deadline with datetime conversion

Now tasks created with ''сегодня'' will have deadline set correctly and appear in /today")
